transArray.content: The service is very good and the room is very clean. When I went out to play, the front desk gave me a guide. There is a robot to deliver food, which is very convenient. I highly recommend checking in. Check out was also delayed until two o'clock.

Dear guests: Thank you for your praise and sharing your wonderful experience. Your satisfaction is the driving force for our efforts and we look forward to meeting you again by fate in the vast sea of ​​people~
